statements: SELECT * FROM fraudulent_activities;
SELECT activity_id, description, activity_date FROM fraudulent_activities;
SELECT activity_type, fraud_level FROM fraudulent_activities WHERE fraud_level > 5;
SELECT description FROM fraudulent_activities WHERE activity_type = 'Hacking';
SELECT * FROM fraudulent_activities ORDER BY activity_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM fraudulent_activities WHERE fraud_level > 5 ORDER BY activity_date DESC;
SELECT activity_id, activity_type, description FROM fraudulent_activities WHERE activity_type = 'Phishing' ORDER BY activity_date ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM fraudulent_activities WHERE activity_date >= '2022-01-01' AND activity_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT activity_id, activity_date, description FROM fraudulent_activities WHERE fraud_level = 10 ORDER BY activity_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT activity_type FROM fraudulent_activities WHERE fraud_level BETWEEN 5 AND 8 ORDER BY activity_type ASC;
SELECT * FROM fraud_activities;
SELECT activity_type, activity_date FROM fraud_activities WHERE activity_type = 'Fraudulent';
SELECT user_id, user_name, registration_date FROM fraudulent_users WHERE is_suspected_fraudster = TRUE;
SELECT user_name, registration_date FROM fraudulent_users ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM fraud_activities UNION SELECT * FROM fraudulent_users;
SELECT * FROM fraudulent_users WHERE is_suspected_fraudster = TRUE ORDER BY registration_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_name, registration_date FROM fraudulent_users WHERE registration_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY registration_date ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT activity_id, activity_type, activity_date FROM fraud_activities WHERE activity_type IN ('Phishing', 'Identity Theft') ORDER BY activity_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_name, registration_date FROM fraudulent_users WHERE user_name LIKE '%fraud%' ORDER BY registration_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT activity_id, activity_type, activity_date, activity_description FROM fraud_activities ORDER BY activity_date ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM fraudulent_activities;
SELECT activity_type, fraud_amount FROM fraudulent_activities ORDER BY fraud_amount DESC;
SELECT fraudster_name, fraudster_email, fraudster_phone FROM fraudsters WHERE fraudster_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT investigation_date, investigator_name FROM investigation_logs WHERE investigator_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT activity_type, SUM(fraud_amount) AS total_fraud_amount FROM fraudulent_activities GROUP BY activity_type;
SELECT * FROM fraudulent_activities;
SELECT activity_id, activity_type, activity_date FROM fraudulent_activities ORDER BY activity_date DESC;
SELECT fraudster_name, fraudster_email, fraudster_phone FROM fraudsters WHERE fraudster_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT log_id, investigation_date, investigator_name, investigation_details FROM investigation_logs WHERE investigator_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM fraudulent_activities WHERE fraud_amount > 1000 ORDER BY activity_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM fraudulent_activities;
SELECT id, activity_date, activity_description FROM fraudulent_activities ORDER BY activity_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM fraudulent_activities WHERE user_id = 101 AND location_id = 201;
SELECT id, activity_date, activity_description, activity_type FROM fraudulent_activities WHERE activity_type = 'Fraud';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_activities FROM fraudulent_activities GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT * FROM fraudulent_activities WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT activity_type, activity_date FROM fraudulent_activities WHERE location_id = 2 ORDER BY activity_date DESC;
SELECT fa.activity_description, u.username, l.city FROM fraudulent_activities fa JOIN users u ON fa.user_id = u.user_id JOIN locations l ON fa.location_id = l.location_id WHERE fa.id = 3;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT fa.*, fat.type_name FROM fraudulent_activities fa JOIN fraudulent_activity_types fat ON fa.activity_type = fat.type_id ORDER BY fa.activity_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM fraudulent_activities;
SELECT activity_id, activity_type FROM fraudulent_activities;
SELECT activity_id, activity_type, activity_date FROM fraudulent_activities WHERE activity_type = 'Fraudulent';
SELECT * FROM fraudulent_participants ORDER BY participant_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM fraud_detection WHERE detection_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY detection_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM fraudulent_activities ORDER BY activity_date DESC, activity_type ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT activity_id, activity_type FROM fraudulent_activities WHERE activity_description LIKE '%fraud%' ORDER BY activity_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT AVG(transaction_amount) AS average_amount, MAX(transaction_amount) AS max_amount FROM fraudulent_transactions;
SELECT participant_name, participant_role, participant_contact_info FROM fraudulent_participants WHERE participant_role = 'Fraud Analyst' ORDER BY participant_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT report_author, report_date FROM fraud_reports WHERE report_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY report_date ASC LIMIT 5;
